content: **paws for thought ** when you re ticked off and things get ruff get a new leash on life and have fun with a dog these frisbees are sturdy and durable fun for a dog to catch they also have a handle-lip deep enough to play tug it is a very easy spiral pattern and can be made in about an hour you can personalize the frisbee with the dog s name or add appliques like bones or paw prints so go fetch your hook and yarn and ruff one out in no time enjoy pan
